name: High School Girl Life Sim 3D
summary: High School Simulator is a new and exciting high School life game where the user would play as High School anime girl. This high school game has variety of missions which will give you the real joy of simulator games as the user is supposed to perform multiple task and experience the life of a real world school girl. In this girls game make new friends and become a popular girl in high school class, so find new friends to make your day memorable in your life.
